am_hal_sysctrl.c File Reference

Functions for interfacing with the M55 system control registers. More...

Detailed Description

Functions for interfacing with the M55 system control registers.

#include <stdint.h>
#include <stdbool.h>
#include "am_mcu_apollo.h"
#include "am_hal_clkmgr_private.h"
